original_text: And they departed from the mount of the Lord three days' journey: and the ark of the covenant of the Lord went before them in the three days' journey, to search out a resting place for them.
korean_text: 그들이 여호와의 산에서 떠나 삼 일 길을 갈 때에 여호와의 언약궤가 그 삼 일 길에 앞서 가며 그들의 쉴 곳을 찾았고

sentences.original_text: And they departed from the mount of the Lord
and the ark of the covenant of the Lord
to search out a resting place for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 위하여 쉴 곳을 찾으려 함이었더라.
